text: My apologies this is the wrong Chanellos Pizza..... Thank you for showing you reach out to your customers. Rock on! I was looking for the one in Virginia Beach.

text: Always quick. Always good. Pizzas are a little on the smaller side, but they’re also homemade. I’ll continue my patronage every time I’m in town!

text: The only reason it gets two stars instead of one is that there was a free ranch inside the box. The crust was hard to eat. I ordered a one-topping but it came with like a 1/3 topping. Don't trust the high reviews, they seem like reviews left by owners/staff. Would much rather of just had a generic chain pizza than this.
